author: slaws
msg: Support the removal of a contribution
Make the domain proxy always available to the sca binding in order to manage cross composite comms within a node when no domain is started

author: trawick
msg: example invocations now flagged as invalid:
specifying UTC offset with size-based rotation
range checking of integer parameters not attempted; basic data type issues may need
to be addressed first such as the use of unsigned int for max file size
